pages.text: $(l)Mjölnir$(), the legendary hammer of Thor, is a weapon of immense power, forged by the masterful dwarves, $(l:entities/huldra_brothers) Brok and Sindri$(). $(br2)This divine instrument channels the raw energy of thunder and lightning, symbolizing Thor’s formidable strength and authority.$()$(br2)$(l)Abilities:$()$(li)$(l)Thunderous Impact:$() When thrown, Mjölnir strikes and knocks back all living creatures within a 5-block radius, unleashing devastating lightning bolts. Thrown Mjölnir will hit all creatures in its path while flying.$(li)$(l)Weapon Summoning:$() When you right-click with an empty main hand, the hammer returns to its master's grasp.$(li)$(l)Flight:$() By releasing Mjölnir while holding the shift key, one can soar through the skies. The hammer’s power allows for a dive attack, where increased velocity results in greater damage to surrounding entities (in Survival Mode only).$(li)$(l)Loyalty:$() Mjölnir is loyal to its master, ensuring that no other warrior can lift it from the ground.

pages.title: Mjölnir Handle
pages.text: Obtaining this weapon involves both crafting and trading. $(br2)Firstly, one must craft the $(l)Mjölnir Handle$().

pages.title: Mjölnir Head
pages.text: Secondly, one will also need to craft the $(l)Mjölnir Head$().
Finally, to obtain the legendary $(l)Mjölnir$(), one must give the $(l)Handle$() and the $(l)Head$() to $(l:entities/huldra_brothers)Brok and Sindri$().
